name: Planetside 2 - 2nd Anniversary Bundle
detailed_description:
In celebration of PlanetSide 2’s two-year anniversary, up your game with this special anniversary bundle that includes new anniversary camo, unique weapons, a six month heroic boost and MORE! Hurry, this bundle is only available until November 30th and once it’s gone, it’s gone forever!

Here's what you get in the limited time 2nd Anniversary Bundle:

  • Heroic Booster - 6 Month
  • 2nd Year Anniversary Camo for NC / TR / VS
  • Hard Light Armor NC / TR / VS - All Classes
  • Implant 5-pack
  • Hexedge TR Anniversary Knife
  • Hardlight Dagger NC Anniversary Knife
  • Damascus Edge VS Anniversary Knife
  • Scythe Anniversary Horn
  • Reaver Anniversary Horn
  • Mosquito Anniversary Horn
  • NS-15M AE LMG
  • NS Baron G5AE Shotgun
  • Prowler Anniversary Horn
  • Vanguard Anniversary Horn
  • Magrider Anniversary Horn

short_description: In celebration of PlanetSide 2’s two-year anniversary, up your game with this special anniversary bundle that includes new anniversary camo, unique weapons, a six month heroic boost and MORE! Hurry, this bundle is only available until November 30th and once it’s gone, it’s gone forever!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
